synopsis.text:
Neptune, the host of Planeptune's Cosplay Party, is exhausted from the preparations when she learns that her older self, whom she encountered in the mountains during her summer vacation, is arriving in this dimension. Nepgear and friends decide to leave Neptune to finish the party prep and pick up Older Neptune, only to find Neptune completely burned out upon their return.

This is the premise of the second installment of the Neptune OVA Series Trilogy, which was initially released on various streaming platforms in Japan in late December 2021. The OVA comes bundled with Good Smile Company's Dimension Traveler Neptune: Generator Unit ver. 1/7 scale figure.

Originally, the four goddesses and their sisters had planned to meet at a resort in the mountains of Lastation Kingdom to enjoy a real summer holiday. However, their tranquil getaway is disrupted when a gate to a parallel world opens unexpectedly, pulling the younger sisters in! Fortunately, they are greeted by familiar faces on the other side, making their unexpected journey a little more bearable. Will they find their way back to their own dimension? Tune in to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
